programme.title: Love Wrecked
programme.desc: Jenny Taylor (Amanda Bynes) has found her ideal man who she just knows would sweep her off her feet. The only problem? He's Jason Masters (Chris Carmack), the world's biggest rock star. Hoping for a chance to get close to her idol, Jenny takes a job in his favourite Caribbean resort with her best friend Ryan (Jonathan Bennett). When Jason is washed overboard in a storm, Jenny jumps in to save him and the pair find themselves stranded on a seemingly-deserted tropical island.

programme.title: Awkward Sexy People
programme.desc: Jeff and Anne, two close friends and co-workers in a suburban high school, are embarrassingly unlucky at love. With nothing else to lose, they hatch a plan to transform themselves over the course of a sex-and-alcohol-fueled summer into the cool, confident people they aspire to be. At first an exhilarating adventure of self-discovery, Jeff and Anne's journey turns into a laugh-out-loud experiment as they lose their identities, their dignity, and quite possibly each other.

programme.title: A Few Less Men
programme.desc: The wedding that brought the now-married David (Xavier Samuel: Twilight, Fury) and his best buddies Tom (Kris Marshall: Love Actually, Death in Paradise) and Graham (Kevin Bishop A Few Best Men) to the Blue Mountains is done and dusted. But their mate Luke has done himself a mischief – as you do, after the speeches – by getting drunk and falling off a cliff. Our boys suddenly find themselves transporting their friend’s corpse back to London.

programme.title: My Ex-Ex
programme.desc: When Mary's boyfriend Ted invites her out to a fancy restaurant, she's convinced he's going to pop the question. But instead of getting hitched, Mary gets dumped. To cheer her up, Mary's friends take her to see a psychic who casts a spell to reconnect Mary with her ex-boyfriend. The only problem is... Mary didn't say which one. She bumps into her college boyfriend Patrick, and despite feeling he's completely wrong for her, she slowly falls for him again. Ted soon realises his mistake and wants Mary back. Mary is torn between her two exes: Mr. Right on paper, and Mr. Right for her.

programme.title: Entanglement
programme.desc: Entanglement' is a charmingly quirky romantic comedy with a twist! While searching for the meaning of his existence, Ben Layton (Thomas Middleditch: 'Silicon Valley') uncovers a family secret that leads him to a woman named Hanna (Jess Weixler: 'The Good Wife') who might have almost been his adopted sister. But when he and Hanna inadvertently fall in love, and his life becomes increasingly and weirdly complicated, Ben starts to realise that everything is incredibly connected and love may give him a new lease on life.

programme.title: The Romantics
programme.desc: Love is tested over one raucous night when seven college pals reunite to watch two of their own say ‘I do’. Based on the acclaimed novel by Galt Niederhoffer. Featuring an all star cast including Josh Duhamel, Malin Akerman, Adam Brody, Dianna Agron and Elijah Wood.

programme.title: Ancient Grains - Amaranth
programme.desc: When you open your pantry, do images of the rugged mountains of South America, the colorful tablelands of Africa and the fertile river valleys of the Middle East dance before your eyes? If not, you have yet to discover amaranth, quinoa, spelt, kamut and teff, the quintet of nutritional powerhouses known as the ancient grains. The legends behind their origins many millennia past, their loss over time and their ultimate modern revival - literally tell the story of civilization.

programme.title: The Plastic Whales of Amsterdam

programme.title: Black Sunday
programme.desc: A detailed report of the Holocaust in Romania. During World War II, two trains were loaded with Jews. Where they will be taken? To their deaths. Four survivors of Romanian Holocaust tell us what happened in Iasi during the Pogrom, a horror which took place on June 29, 1941. Over 13,000 people died in that single day, a day which has become known as Black Sunday in remembrance of those who lost their lives.

programme.title: Shifting Ice + Changing Tides
programme.desc: ‘Shifting Ice and Changing Tides’ is a human and wind powered, female led, ski and sail expedition to the west coast of Greenland. programme.title: Wonder Women S1E1 India

programme.title: Only Me Generation
programme.desc: Has China’s ‘one child policy’ really created a generation of spoilt, privileged, selfish young adults? This documentary is a brave expose of what everyday life is like for the ‘Only Me’ generation in China. For the first time on camera, these young Chinese will speak candidly of the huge pressure and high expectations from their parents and reveal the dreams, worries, hopes and fears of a generation.

programme.title: Traceable

programme.title: SEVE - Artist, Fighter, Legend
programme.desc: Seve Ballesteros was an artist, a golfing Picasso. He was a fighter against back injury, rivals on the golf course, a disintegrating swing, and finally cancer. He remains a legend, a multi-major champion and the man who made the modern Ryder Cup. This is his story, from members of his inner circle, other sporting greats and from himself via newly unearthed material.

programme.title: BVB 09 Stories - Who we are: Hometown love - Away from home (Episode 1)
programme.desc: Marco Reus and Michael Zorc are two of the most prominent figures of Borussia Dortmund. Though they were both born and educated in Dortmund, they were sent away to other clubs and later returned to BVB. As well as being devoted to the pitch, Reus is very engaged with his home town and Zorc has been with BVB for 42 years. How does it feel to be at home? What are the disadvantages of loving your home when you are always on the road with a packed schedule, staying in hotels and away from family? At what point do you lose the feeling of home? This episode shows two different perspectives of life as a footballer.

programme.title: BVB 09 Stories - Who we are: Mentality (Episode 2)
programme.desc: With plenty of midweek matchdays and packed schedules, the pressure can be a lot on the body and the brain, but schedules are more important now than ever before. As a result of COVID-19, the usual atmosphere created by fans in the stadium – characterised by the legendary “Yellow Wall” – has disappeared. Players are used to crowds of 81,000 fans and the energy they create can sometimes be the difference between playing a good game or smashing their opponent. However, there is a thin line between how much pressure you need to achieve your goals and when this pressure is impacting your mental health.

programme.title: BVB 09 Stories - Who we are: Uprooting (Episode 3)
programme.desc: After the initial games, the First Eleven is established where the next generation of footballers may end up playing a crucial role for BVB. While Giovanni Reyna has already had a breakthrough into the pro team, the even younger Youssoufa Moukoko works on his debut. How do these two exceptional teenagers cope with the challenges of being in the public eye from a young early? This episode takes a close look into the challenges of talent promotion and social responsibility.

programme.title: MessiCirque
programme.desc: We will see the formative moments, the creative and artistic development, Messi´s participation with the project, training, rehearsals and the "Messi10 Challenge LaLiga". This is the interactive experience that lets you "be Messi for a day", ending with the long-awaited premiere of Messi10 in Barcelona. We will accompany the creators, artists and Messi on a trip from Montreal to Barcelona and discover a story about dreams that come true. MessiCirque combines Cirque du Soleil´s vision to tell, for the first time, the story of a living sports legend with a child´s ambition to play football.

programme.title: Ride Your Dream
programme.desc: Motorcycling was a man’s world, until now. This documentary introduces us to Ana Carrasco, the Spanish rider who has revolutionised the two wheels’ world and who, from an early age, had a clear dream: being world champion. Through intimate conversations with her family and team, we get to know Ana’s motivations, the obstacles she has faced and the dreams she keeps chasing. Her career, from its origins in a small town in Murcia to being the first woman to win the World Championship, is a source of inspiration for anyone. Ana herself is a clear example of overcoming struggle and tenacity, and her story which is full of exciting moments encourages us all to fight for our dreams.

programme.title: Made in Senegal
programme.desc: Made in Senegal is a story about will, dreams, determination, faith, rebellion, courage and love. The film invites us on a journey through Sadio´s different and highly diverse worlds - from the rural life in a small village in the far south of Senegal to the spotlight of world football by playing for Liverpool FC, even winning the Champions Leagues as number 10 with the world watching… The interaction of animations, documentary scenes, a diverse set of in-depth interviews and archive footage brings Sadio´s past to life and creates an exciting and emotional plot.

programme.title: The Secrets of La Roja – World Champions 2010
programme.desc: On the 11th July 2010, Spain’s national team reached its goal of winning the World Cup, a victory that was felt by the team and nation as a whole. Despite this successful ending, “La Roja” had to overcome various struggles and difficulties in order to become legendary. The team arrived in South Africa with the triumph of the 2008 European Football Championship under their belt and Vicente del Bosque leading the way. There was a general feeling of favoritism attributed to ""La Roja"" and while the defeat against Switzerland in the first match came as a shock, it motivated Del Bosque and his team to come together and focus on one intention: good football and one goal: to make history.

programme.title: MessiCirque
programme.desc: We will see the formative moments, the creative and artistic development, Messi´s participation with the project, training, rehearsals and the "Messi10 Challenge LaLiga". This is the interactive experience that lets you "be Messi for a day", ending with the long-awaited premiere of Messi10 in Barcelona. We will accompany the creators, artists and Messi on a trip from Montreal to Barcelona and discover a story about dreams that come true. MessiCirque combines Cirque du Soleil´s vision to tell, for the first time, the story of a living sports legend with a child´s ambition to play football.

We take a look at the possibilities and the latest findings in research.

programme.title: The Okinaway of Life
programme.desc: A wonderful journey in the heart of a legendary civilization that owns the world longevity record in good health. The archipelago of Okinawa, located in the Pacific Ocean at the very south of Japan sees its population with almost no diseases. What are the secrets of Okinawa’s inhabitants ? How can we live longer, happy and in good health ?

programme.title: Deeper - The Adventure of Ultra Deep Diving
programme.desc: There are more people who have walked on the surface of the Moon than people who have dived below a depth of 800 feet. Pascal Bernabé is one of them. In 1996, still unknown to the public, he accepts to dive 577 feet deep to bring back two robots trapped in a cave. The mission is a success. But Pascal wants more, he becomes addicted to ultra-deep diving. Soon, he makes a new successful attempt to go below 660 feet.

programme.title: Australian Penguins
programme.desc: Little Penguins are the smallest penguin in the world and are the only species that live and breed in Australia. This documentary focuses on the penguin colony that live on Western Australia's, Penguin Island. The island's Discovery Centre houses a small group of rescued penguins, which have either been injured, orphaned or abandoned as chicks. Australian Penguins gives an insight into their amazing stories of survival and all the funny things this group of Little Penguins get up to.

programme.title: In Search Of The Viking Horse
programme.desc: The programme will provide a rich mythological and historical background to this unique breed of horse. As well as covering the Landsmot festival, the film will trace the ancestry of the breed, which has been kept pure by the banning of all imported horses.

programme.title: Killer in the Caves
programme.desc: About 6.5 million bats have died in the last six years in North America. A disease is driving the Little Brown Bats to extinction and causes mass mortalities among other bat species. The epidemic is still a riddle, but bat-experts piece together information like criminal investigators. The ingenuity of the scientists is captured through astonishing experiments and groundbreaking technology in an effort to understand this mysterious disease and learn more about this common yet unknown animal.

programme.title: Brewster The Rooster

programme.title: Booba

programme.title: Om Nom

programme.title: Bernard Bear
programme.desc: The polar bear without hair - don't ask what happened. Primitive, selfish, impatient...Not only TROUBLE MAKER but TROUBLE FINDER too.

programme.title: F.A.S.T.
programme.desc: For many years, two clans ruled by super villains—Hegemon the Rhinoceros and Darwin the Atomic Monkey—have been at each other’s throats. Blinded by their desire to rule the world, they’ve turned it into a combat field and would’ve probably already destroyed it… If it weren’t for the Fearless Animals Special Team! After being alerted to yet another scheme of the super-villains, the furry FAST starts fighting them, always coming out on top.

programme.title: Marc & Zoe Cooking

programme.title: Mams Keyboard

programme.title: Ice Skating

programme.title: Haymaking

programme.title: Feeding the Chickens
programme.desc: The Teletubbies dance in and out of the trees. The Teletubbies watch Matthew, James and Mark feeding their chickens. There's toast all over Teletubbyland when the Tubby Toaster makes too much toast.

programme.title: Going on a Train
programme.desc: The Teletubbies love to play slide games. They stop when it is time to watch some children go on a train journey. Po loves to ride her scooter, but one day it rolls away and Po chases it all over Teletubbyland.

programme.title: Herding Sheep
programme.desc: Some voice trumpets rise to wish the Tubbies good morning. The Teletubbies watch some children herding sheep. The Teletubbies go in and out, and up and down, round the corner and along to top until it is time for Tubby Custard.

programme.title: Eid, New Clothes
programme.desc: The Teletubbies watch some children try on their new clothes for the Eid festival. A mirror appears in Teletubbyland. Laa-Laa and Dipsy love to look at their reflection, but when Tinky Winky wants to have a go, he's too tall.

programme.title: Picking & Sorting
programme.desc: The Teletubbies watch some girls spend the day picking and sorting vegetables in their nannies garden. Tinky Winky sets the table for Tubby Toast, but when he calls the other Tubbies, Noo-Noo tidies it all up. Po makes some more and the Teletubbies eat it very quickly/

programme.title: Number 9
programme.desc: The Teletubbies pop up to say hello before they gather round to watch some children learn about the number nine. Po and Tinky Winky count nine flowers that appear in Teletubbyland and then run off to fin Dipsy and Laa-Laa and dance the Bump dance.

programme.title: Going to School by Boat

programme.title: Squirrels

programme.title: Dry Stone Wall

programme.title: Urban Birds
programme.desc: Andy Brown and some children feed some birds and watch them playing on the bird table. In Teletubbyland, it's timer for Tubby Custard, but Dipsy spills his all over a Tubby Seat. No-one wants to sit in the Tubby Custard, so Noo-Noo tidies it up.

programme.title: Bubble Pictures

It also explores claims that their punishment has been a sham, as reporter Deborah Davies investigates how inmates at secure units are treated and interviews experts to learn whether eight years has been sufficient time to successfully rehabilitate the pair.

Is Johnny's far-fetched story about the box correct, or is there an even more fiendish plot behind it all?

Forsaken by the local townspeople, advised by Sheriff Wingate (Dale Wilson) to leave town, Lillian decides instead to take a stand against her sociopathic stalker, and enlists the help of an ex-logger Lester (Sir Anthony Hopkins) and his laconic young sidekick Nate (Alexander Ludwig), the only two men in town brave enough, or crazy enough, to go with her, and go up against Blackway.

Frustrated writer, Monte Wildhorn, takes a lakeside cabin for the summer to rekindle his passion for writing. While there he befriends the family next door who help him to find inspiration again. Starring Academy Award Winner Morgan Freeman.

programme.desc: Following on from THE SNOW QUEEN, the next chapter in the tale of Gerda, Orm and her friends sees a whole host of brand new, lovable characters join old favourites for another adventure in the wintry wonderland. THE SNOW QUEEN: MAGIC OF THE ICE MIRROR follows the troll Orm, as he exaggerates his exploits during THE SNOW QUEEN, creating a web of lies in which he single-handedly defeated the treacherous Queen. He claims he is destined to marry the princess and inherit great power and riches – but where will Orm\’s stories lead him? In this lively and perilous adventure, Orm learns that friends, happiness, and true love cannot be won through deceit.

programme.desc: The Parcel The Butterfly The Surprise The Forest The Pumpkin The Armchair Stage Fright Molang is an affectionate, humorous look at the relationship between an eccentric, joyful, and enthusiastic rabbit, and a shy, discreet, and emotional little chick. The series explores Molang and Piu Piu’s everyday life with warmth and humor.

programme.title: Pumpkin Reports - Season 1 - Episodes 35-36
programme.desc: Grounding max | Progress report Max Green’s new brother and sister are aliens sent to Earth as the advance party for an invasion - and he’s the only one who can stop them turning humans into unwilling slave-gardeners.

programme.title: Pumpkin Reports - Season 1 - Episodes 7-8
programme.desc: Lost city of Kemii-Rodor | Saving Goliath Max Green’s new brother and sister are aliens sent to Earth as the advance party for an invasion - and he’s the only one who can stop them turning humans into unwilling slave-gardeners.

programme.title: Alex - Season 1 - Episodes 16-20
programme.desc: Rhinoceros | Gnu | Snake | Kiwi | Chameleon Alex is a curious 5 year old boy who wants to learn from the world around him. Throughout the four seasons of the series he will discover where fruits and vegetables come from, what animals are in the sea and in the jungle and the sound of musical instruments.

programme.title: Telmo And Tula, Little Cooks - Season 1 - Episodes 19-21
programme.desc: Salmon Canapés | Vanilla Ice Cream | Veggie Sandwich Telmo & Tula is a very fun animated series in which children learn to cook the best breakfasts, sandwiches, salads and desserts in a safe and entertaining way. Telmo and Tula will teach children how fun it is to prepare delicious meals step by step.

programme.title: Pumpkin Reports - Season 1 - Episodes 43-44
programme.desc: Young Simon says | Pixel & Teresa date Max Green’s new brother and sister are aliens sent to Earth as the advance party for an invasion - and he’s the only one who can stop them turning humans into unwilling slave-gardeners.

programme.title: Boom & Reds - Season 1 - Episodes 19-24
programme.desc: From episode 19 to 24 The Reds are tiny creatures who are part of a community that lives together in a tree belonging to a fantastic world. The Reds love to gather and draw pictures and in each chapter, the ogre Boom has to guess what the Reds are drawing on the ground.

programme.title: The Book of Love
programme.desc: When Penny, the light of Henry’s life, is killed in a car crash, he puts everything on hold as he tries to come to terms with his loss. When his bereavement leave is over, everyone expects straight-laced Henry to return to work. But now everything has changed and Henry is not going back. Before Penny got in the car the day of her death, she asked Henry to keep an eye out for Millie, an extraordinary vagrant girl she’d seen collecting plastic bottles and other scraps around their neighbourhood. At the time, Henry agreed just to indulge his wife, but this promise soon becomes his last remaining connection to Penny, and nothing else matters.

programme.title: All I See is You
programme.desc: The film follows the story of a blind woman (portrayed by Blake Lively) and her husband (Jason Clarke). When her sight unexpectedly returns, she begins to discover the previously unseen and disturbing details about themselves, their marriage and their lives.

programme.title: Black Mountain
programme.desc: At a site 100 miles from the nearest native reservation, during a Canadian winter, a group of archaeologists have made a startling discovery: The tip of a mysterious, ancient structure, which bears some archaic engravings. The crew, led by Jensen, attempt to decipher it but some mysteries are better left buried. As they delve further into the structure's origins, things at their camp turn strange. Communications fail, local workers suddenly disappear and the men are stricken with a terrible illness. It's not long before they begin to feel the effects of solitude and then things get really bad...

programme.title: Eden
programme.desc: Paul is a teenager caught up in the rave scene of 90s Paris, rubbing shoulders with future greats, Daft Punk. After forming a DJ duo of his own, Paul’s dedication to the music he loves sees him travel the world at the forefront of a musical revolution. But as the hedonism of his youth gives way to the reality of his advancing years, Paul must choose between his dreams and responsibilities.

programme.title: Once More
programme.desc: From acclaimed director Rob Reiner (The Bucket List and When Harry Met Sally...). Monte Wildhorn (Morgan Freeman), a once legendary novelist whose struggle with alcoholism has sapped his passion for writing, takes a lakeside cabin for the summer in picturesque Belle Isle, and befriends the family next door, an attractive single mum (Virginia Madsen) and her young daughters, who help him find inspiration again.

programme.title: Invasion Planet Earth
programme.desc: After the death of his young daughter, Tom Dunn is a broken man. When his wife falls pregnant again, he cannot believe their luck. However, his joy is short-lived, as, on the very same day, the people of Earth become plagued with terrifying visions of the end of the world. When a gigantic, all-consuming alien mothership appears in the sky and launches a ruthless attack on Earth's cities, chaos and destruction follow. Tom must find the strength and wisdom to save his wife and unborn child. However, first he must confront a shocking truth. A truth which threatens the key to the survival of the human race. The ultimate war for Planet Earth is about to begin...

programme.title: Kill Command
programme.desc: Set in the very near future, an elite squad of highly trained marines, led by commanding officer Captain Bukes, are sent on a routine training exercise to a remote island, from which all communications have been cut off. Accompanying them on the mission is 'tech head' Specialist Mills, a mysterious coder whose brain is interfaced with a computer. When they reach the island, the unit soon discover they are not alone and the exercise is far from routine. They become live targets of terrifyingly advanced military robots and begin to suspect that Mills is somehow involved in the conspiracy. But without the help of Mill's technology, they know they won't survive.

programme.title: Rise of the Viking
programme.desc: From the director of epic fantasy favourite, 'Black Sails', and starring 'Breaking Bad's' Jonathan Banks, is historical actioner 'Rise of the Viking'. In the year of 754 AD, during a time of epic battles and bloodshed, the legend of the pagan warrior King Redbad, is born, but so is a new weapon against his people: Christianity. Redbad must ultimately unite a Viking army powerful enough to defeat the seemingly invincible Franks.

programme.title: Miss Meadows
programme.desc: Beneath the perfect manners and petticoats, Miss Meadows harbours a dark secret. When she's not teaching at the local elementary school or tending to her garden, she's moonlighting as a gun-wielding vigilante who teaches justice in her spare time, killing her victims if they refuse to repent. With blood on her hands and dark secrets to hide, a local sheriff soon becomes involved in hunting down the ruthless murderer, not knowing that the person who he is after is the woman he has fallen in love with.

programme.title: Guardians of the Tomb
programme.desc: An innocent discovery of a well-preserved mummified Emperor unearths a 2000-year-old nightmare - a secret that should have remained buried. A team of scientists, who lose a colleague in an ancient labyrinth, must work together to recover him while trying to make the discovery of a century. In their quest to rescue him, they find themselves underground, battling ancient, terrifying Chinese magic and making their way through a swarm of deadly, man-eating spiders – only to uncover the secret behind the insects’ power and intelligence.
